data.title: Noble News
data.text:
For News about Nobility around the World.

We at Noble News want to keep you up-to-date on all the Nobility and Royalty around the world we live in, whether it be old, recent or new claims.

January - December 2008

2002 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009

December 29, 2008 -

- Countess Anna Maria von Pocci (Thurn und Taxis) died aged 64

- Lady Anne Cavendish-Bentinck died aged 92

December 27, 2008 -

- Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum of Dubai and Sheikha Sheikha bint Saeed bin Thani Al Maktoum of Dubai are engaged

- Tuanku Ja'afar ibni Almarhum Tuanku Abdul Rahman, The Yang di-Pertuan Besar of Negeri Sembilan died at the Tuanku Ja'afar Hospital, Seremban, Malaysia, aged 86

December 24, 2008 -

- Jonathan Alexis Victor, son of Hereditary Prince Carl-Ferdinand and Hereditary Princess Elna-Margret zu Bentheim und Steinfurt, at hospital in Münster, Germany

- Dagmar Heine née Princess zu Schaumburg-Lippe widowed Kalau vom Hofe died aged 74

December 19, 2008 - Sheikh Abdullah bin Ahmed bin Humaid Al Qasimi of Ras Al Khaimah married Sheikha .. bint Fahim bin Abdullah Al Qasimi

December 18, 2008 - Sheikh Khalid bin Hamad bin Khalifa Al-Thani of Qatar married Sheikha Mariam bint Nasser bin Abdullah al-Ahmad Al-Thani of Qatar

December 15, 2008 -

- Sheikh Khalid bin Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nayhan of Abu Dhabi married Sheikha .. bint Surour bin Mohammed Al Nayhan

- Countess Ingrid van Rechteren Limpurg née Pieksma died at Doetinchem, The Netherlands, aged 72

December 13, 2008 - Hereditary Prince Carl-Christian zu Solms-Hohensolms-Lich married civilly Countess Christina Douglas at the Thonetschlössl in Vienna, Austria

December 09, 2008 - Sheikh Ali bin Rashid Al Mualla of Umm al-Qaiwain died

December 06, 2008 -

- Count Rodolphe de Limburg Stirum married civilly Archduchess Marie-Christine of Austria at the town hall at Mechelen (Malines), Belgium

- Count Rodolphe de Limburg Stirum married religiously Archduchess Marie-Christine of Austria at the St. Rombouts Cathedral at Mechelen (Malines), Belgium

- Martha "Sunny" von Bülow née Crawford (divorced Auersperg) died at the Mary Manning Walsh Nursing Home, Manhattan, New York City, USA, aged 77

December 05, 2008 - Ludwig Botho Elgar Wilhelm Martin, son of Prince Alexander and Princess Caroline zu Stolberg-Roßla

December 03, 2008 - Alexei Friedrich Julius, son of Count Friedrich and Countess Christine zu Ortenburg, at Hannover

December 02, 2008 - Princess Pema Tsedeun Yapshi Pheunkhang Lacham Kusho "Coocoola" of Sikkim died aged 84

December 01, 2008 - Friederike Marie-Christine Elisabeth Thaddaea Benita Eleonore Felipa, daughter of Prince Alexander and Princess Nadja Anna zu Schaumburg-Lippe, at München, Germany

- Prince Jean de France, Duke de Vendôme, and Philomena de Tornos y Steinhart are engaged

- Sheikh Abdullah bin Humaid bin Abdullah Al Qasimi of Ras Al Khaimah married Sheikha .. bint Saqr bin Mohammed Al Qasimi

-Sheikh Mohammed bin Humaid bin Abdullah Al Qasimi of Ras Al Khaimah married Sheikha .. bint Saqar bin Khalid Al Qasimi at the Dubai World Trade Centre

- Munira, daughter of Prince Ali bin Nayef and Princess Reema of Jordan

September 22, 2008 -

- Former King Fuad II of Egypt and Dominique-France Picard (Fadila) at Switzerland are divorced

- Princess Sultanah bint Abdul Aziz of Saudi Arabia died

- Rayet Al Noor, daughter of Prince Hashem bin Al Hussein and Princess Fahdah Hashem of Jordan
